short_summary: Parachute spares for Department of National Defence
full_summary:
**CT-6 Spares Tender Notice**

Tender Title (English): CT-6 Spares
Tender Title (French): CT-6 Pièces de rechange

Reference Number: PW-22-01004377
Amendment Number: 0
Solicitation Number: W8485-235003/A
Publication Date: August 16, 2022
Tender Closing Date: September 14, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

Expected Contract Start Date: None
Expected Contract End Date: None
Tender Status: Expired

G.S.I.N. Code: 1670BC - Parachutes, Personnel, Assemblies and Components
U.N.S.P.S.C. Code: None
Procurement Category: Goods
Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
Procurement Type: Bid Solicitation

Selection Criteria: None

Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
Regions of Opportunity: Worldwide
Regions of Delivery: Canada

Contracting Entity: Department of National Defence
Contracting Entity Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0K2
Contractor Contact:
   - Danny Lebel, e-mail dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca

Notice Description:

The Department of National Defence is seeking vendors to provide spare parts for the CT-6. This is an open bidding process with an estimated quantity of 2450 items to be delivered by November 30, 2022.

The components required are:

- Item 1: Loop, Securing, Assy, Part No. ID-57-279, NCAGE 57172 (ASNA), Quantity: 400, Unit of Issue: EA
- Item 2: Loop, Safety Stow, Part No. SID-57-336-501, NCAGE 57172 (ASNA), Quantity: 500, Unit of Issue: EA
- Item 3: Loop, Elastic Locking, Part No. ID-57-354, NCAGE 57172 (ASNA), Quantity: 250, Unit of Issue: EA
- Item 4: Loop, Reserve Closing, Part No. ID-57-353, NCAGE 57172 (ASNA), Quantity: 1000, Unit of Issue: EA

Acceptable submissions will include the brand name and model or part number and NCAGE.

All documents may be submitted in one of the official languages of Canada. Preference will be
